snippet.title: Atlus USA Trailer: Yggdra Union
snippet.description:
Ruled by a royal family believed to be descended from the gods, Fantasinia is a propserous and tranquil land -- until the peace is shattered by the invading forces of the Empire of Bronquia.  Princess Yggdra Yuril Artwaltz, the sole survivor of the royal family, escapes with the kingdom's only hope: the holy sword Gran Centurio.  Fleeing to the southern tip of the continent, she encounters an unusual thief named Milanor, a young man destined to help  liberate the people of her kingdom...

Available September 2008.

For more information, visit:
http://www.atlus.com/yggdraunionpsp
